sections.heading: Welcome
sections.content: We just want to say thank you for joining us in our second tanda. Betsy and I (Steve) are grateful for ya'll and for your participation. Last year we started our first tanda and it was a big success. We had 10 people participating the first time and this time we have 13. Continue reading below and you will see the information on what to expect in this upcoming tanda. Once again thank you and if you have any questions feel free to reach out to me

items.item: 1. Tanda will start January 22, 2023 and end January 14, 2024.
2. The payments will be $100 each Sunday. If you forgot to send money, don't worry I will send you a reminder through text.
3. All the money will be sent through Zelle. Here is my number so you can send me the money, 832-382-3729.
4. Since we are 13 people this time, the money will be given out every 4 weeks. The amount you should receive is $5,200 each participant.
5. Lastly, please give your host a tip if you feel inclined to do so once you've received your total amount :) .
